LanguageData.Misc_Battlefield.label: Battlefield
LanguageData.Misc_Battlefield.description: Two mortal enemies meet each other on the battlefield.
LanguageData.Misc_Battlefield.descriptionDialogue: there are {0} warriors in the area
LanguageData.Misc_Battlefield.arrivedLetter: In this area are some warriors who meet their mortal enemies on the battlefield.\n\nBeware, the enemies may also engage you if you approach them.
